venue.name: Tavern in the Square - Central Square

item.description:
So first off, there were waaaay more votes in this poll than the last couple; thank you all for caring! Second, we had a runaway preference: The Blind Assassin by Margaret Atwood. This is one of those books that everyone just raves about, so I'm excited; take a look at the links below for an idea of what you'll be getting yourself into.

The location is TBD. I'm leaning against doing outdoors again, although feel free to lobby me on that next week if you just love communing with the nature that is Harvard Yard. We definitely won't do the previous standard, Clear Conscience Cafe, because it's just too cramped. I'm looking into getting a backroom somewhere that we can sit and book-chat and possibly eat. Whatever shakes out, I'll be sure to get the location up well in advance, and it will definitely be somewhere in Cambridge.

Amazon
Powell's
Wikipedia

Nick
item.name: Cambridge Readers: The Blind Assassin by Margaret Atwood
